1.5em;text-decoration:none}.button.small{font-size:.8em}.button.xsmall{font-size:.6em}.button.big{font-size:1.35em}.button.icon{padding-left:1.35em}.button.icon:before{margin-right:.5em}.button.primary{border:0;color:#fff;background-color:#46a4d7;text-shadow:0 .075em .075em rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.button.primary:hover{background-color:#5baedc;color:#fff;transition:box-shadow .25s;box-shadow:0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.button.primary:active{background-color:#319ad2}.button.danger{background-color:#b43100;color:#fff;border:0}.button.danger:hover{background-color:#ce3800}.button.danger:active{background-color:#9b2a00}.button.special{background-color:#dc6f20;color:#fff;border:0}.button.special:hover{background-color:#e17d34}.button.special:active{background-color:#c6641d}
/*# sourceMappingURL=../maps/mini.css.map */

                    .fixed{width:300px;float:left}.fixed+div{margin-left:300px;overflow:hidden;padding-left:2em!important;float:none}.fixed figure{position:relative;display:inline-block}.fixed figure img{float:left}.fixed figure .gpreview{cursor:pointer;position:absolute;bottom:0;right:0}.fixed .specs{border-right:1px solid #e3e3e3;min-height:291px;padding-right:1em}@media screen and (max-width:736px){.fixed figure{display:block;text-align:center}.fixed figure img{float:none}.fixed,.fixed+div{float:none;clear:both}.fixed{width:100%}.fixed+div{margin-left:0;padding-left:0!important}}.read-text{text-align:justify}.read-text h1,.read-text h2,.read-text h3,.read-text h4{font-size:1em}@media screen and (max-width:736px){.read-text{font-size:.9em;line-height:1.3em}.ratings{margin:0 0 1em}}.buy .interval{color:green;font-size:.8em;font-weight:700}.phone .carousel ul li:nth-child(n+2){display:none}.phone .carousel.active ul li{display:inline-block}.phone .carousel.multi-images li{width:98vw;text-align:center}

            </style>

                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it/u">Calculatoare și IT</a></h4>

                                <ul class="col2 right">

                                <ul class="col1 left">
                                                        <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-aplicatii-de-afaceri/uf">Aplicaţii de afaceri</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-baze-de-date/un">Baze de date</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-certificari-it/uq">Certificări IT</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-dezvoltare-software/um">Dezvoltare software</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-echipament-de-calcul/uk">Echipament de calcul</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-generalitati/ub">Generalități</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-informatica/uy">Informatică</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-retele-de-calculatoare/ut">Reţele de calculatoare</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-securitatea-calculatoarelor/ur">Securitatea calculatoarelor</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-sisteme-de-operare/ul">Sisteme de operare</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-software-digital-media/ug">Software digital media</a></li>
                                                                              <li><a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-stil-de-viata-digital/ud">Stil de viaţă digital</a></li>
                                                      </ul>
            </div>
                                          <div id="prod-stiinte" class="prod-submenu">
                <h4><a class="no-style" href="/carti/stiinte/s">Științe</a></h4>
                                <ul class="col3 right">
                                                            <li class="strong"><a href="/top/carti/stiinte/s">Top vânzări</a></li>

                                <ul class="col2 right">

    <div>
        <div class="row" id="main-row">
            <section id="book-main" class="8u">
                
    <h1><span itemprop="name">JavaScript – The Definitive Guide, 7e</span>
        </h1>
                 De (autor) <a href="/david-flanagan/c/1740205" itemprop="author">David Flanagan</a>    <br>
                <div class="ratings">

    <span class="no-wrap">Notă GoodReads: <a target="_blank" href="https://www.goodreads.com/book/isbn/1491952024"><span id="gr-stars" class="no-wrap color-theme-4"><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star"></i><i class="fa fa-star-empty"></i></span> <span id="gr-value">4.04 · <span class="no-wrap">2,763 note</span></span></a></span>
</div>                
<span class="color-bold">    <a href="/carti/calculatoare-si-it-retele-de-calculatoare/ut?l=eng"><i class="ic ic-en" itemprop="inLanguage">en</i> Limba Engleză</a>
              <link itemprop="bookFormat" href="https://schema.org/Paperback">
      Paperback
        –    <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-29"><a href="/carti?d=20200529">29 May 2020</a>    </span>				<div class="description read-wrap">
                                                        <main class="read-text serif" itemprop="description"><p>JavaScript is the programming language of the web and is used by more software developers today than any other programming language. For nearly 25 years this best seller has been the go-to guide for JavaScript programmers. The seventh edition is fully updated to cover the 2020 version of JavaScript, and new chapters cover classes, modules, iterators, generators, Promises, async/await, and metaprogramming. You'll find illuminating and engaging example code throughout.</p><p>This book is for programmers who want to learn JavaScript and for web developers who want to take their understanding and mastery to the next level. It begins by explaining the JavaScript language itself, in detail, from the bottom up. It then builds on that foundation to cover the web platform and Node.js.</p><p>Topics include: </p><ul><li>Types, values, variables, expressions, operators, statements, objects, and arrays</li><li>Functions, classes, modules, iterators, generators, Promises, and async/await</li><li>JavaScript's standard library: data structures, regular expressions, JSON, i18n, etc.</li><li>The web platform: documents, components, graphics, networking, storage, and threads</li><li>Node.js: buffers, files, streams, threads, child processes, web clients, and web servers</li><li>Tools and language extensions that professional JavaScript developers rely on</li></ul></main>
<a href="#" class="read-more"><i class="fa fa-angle-circled-down"></i> Citește tot</a>
<a href="#" class="read-less"><i class="fa fa-angle-circled-up"></i> Restrânge</a>
                </div>
                                            
            </section>
            <section class="4u">
				<section class="buy box" itemprop="offers" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Offer">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="12u">
                    
              <h4>Preț: <span class="color-theme-5" itemprop="price" content="280.96">280<sup><span class="hidden">.</span>96</sup> lei</span><meta itemprop="priceCurrency" content="RON"></h4>
              <p>              <span class="strike">Preț vechi: 351<sup><span class="hidden">.</span>19</sup> lei</span><br>
                            <span class="pill red-pill">-20%</span>                                          
              
              </p><div><i class="fa fa-gift color-theme-5"></i> Puncte Express: 421</div>                              <hr>
                <div>
                  <span class="tipso-more tipso_style" data-tipso="Prețul nostru, exprimat în €, $, £ și fără TVA, pentru a face mai simplă comparația de preț în valută. Vă rugăm să țineți cont că de obicei pe site-urile străine taxele de transport internațional nu sunt incluse în prețul afișat.">Preț estimativ în valută<sup><i class="fa fa-help-circled"></i></sup></span>:<br>

                </div>

<div class="row 0% ">
        
    	<div class="fixed">
            <h2>Specificații</h2>
<div class="specs">
		<span class="light">ISBN-13:</span> <span itemprop="isbn">9781491952023</span><br>
				<span class="light">ISBN-10:</span> 1491952024<br>
						<span class="light">Pagini:</span> <span itemprop="numberOfPages">600</span><br>
											
						<span class="light">Dimensiuni:</span> 177 x 236
				x 38
				mm<br>
						<span class="light">Greutate:</span> 1.11 kg<br>
								<span class="light">Editura:</span> <a href="/o-reilly/b/100062120" itemprop="publisher" itemtype="https://schema.org/Organization">O'Reilly</a><br>
								</div>    	</div>
    	<div>	
            <div id="related">
                <h2>V-ar putea interesa</h2>
                <div class="carousel  active">
<ul>
      
    <li class=" vsep"><a class="cover " href="/learn-docker-in-a-month-of-lunches/p/um,9781617297052">
                    
              <img alt="Learn Docker in a Month of Lunches" src="https://i0.books-express.ro/bt/9781617297052/learn-docker-in-a-month-of-lunches.jpg">
    </a>
                <div class="ttl">
          <div class="narrow">
          <a href="/learn-docker-in-a-month-of-lunches/p/um,9781617297052" title="Learn Docker in a Month of Lunches" style="width: 179px">Learn Docker in a Month of Lunches</a>
          Elton Stoneman          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="ttl">
          <div class="pill red-pill top-left">-20%</div>          <div class="align-right strong"><span class="narrow">Preț:</span> <span class="color-theme-5">193<sup><span class="hidden">.</span>92</sup> lei</span></div>          <div class="align-right"><span class="strike">242<sup><span class="hidden">.</span>40</sup> lei</span></div>        </div>
        <div class="ttl align-right">&nbsp;

    <script data-no-min="">
    function rc(id, name){
        var el = document.getElementById(id);
        el.className = el.className.replace(name, '');
    }
    function onloadCSS(e,n){function t(){!o&&n&&(o=!0,n.call(e))}var o;e.addEventListener&&e.addEventListener("load",t),e.attachEvent&&e.attachEvent("onload",t),"isApplicationInstalled"in navigator&&"onloadcssdefined"in e&&e.onloadcssdefined(t)}!function(e){"use strict";var n=function(n,t,o){function a(e){return l.body?e():void setTimeout(function(){a(e)})}function d(){r.addEventListener&&r.removeEventListener("load",d),r.media=o||"all"}var i,l=e.document,r=l.createElement("link");if(t)i=t;else{var s=(l.body||l.getElementsByTagName("head")[0]).childNodes;i=s[s.length-1]}var f=l.styleSheets;r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,r.media="only x",a(function(){i.parentNode.insertBefore(r,t?i:i.nextSibling)});var c=function(e){for(var n=r.href,t=f.length;t--;)if(f[t].href===n)return e();setTimeout(function(){c(e)})};return r.addEventListener&&r.addEventListener("load",d),r.onloadcssdefined=c,c(d),r};"undefined"!=typeof exports?exports.loadCSS=n:e.loadCSS=n}("undefined"!=typeof global?global:this);

    var addEventsListener=function(o,t,e){var n,i=t.split(" ");for(n in i)o.addEventListener(i[n],e)}
    !function(){function t(t){this.el=t;for(var n=t.className.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"").split(/\s+/),i=0;i<n.length;i++)e.call(this,n[i])}function n(t,n,i){Object.defineProperty?Object.defineProperty(t,n,{get:i}):t.__defineGetter__(n,i)}if(!("undefined"==typeof window.Element||"classList"in document.documentElement)){var i=Array.prototype,e=i.push,s=i.splice,o=i.join;t.prototype={add:function(t){this.contains(t)||(e.call(this,t),this.el.className=this.toString())},contains:function(t){return-1!=this.el.className.indexOf(t)},item:function(t){return this[t]||null},remove:function(t){if(this.contains(t)){for(var n=0;n<this.length&&this[n]!=t;n++);s.call(this,n,1),this.el.className=this.toString()}},toString:function(){return o.call(this," ")},toggle:function(t){return this.contains(t)?this.remove(t):this.add(t),this.contains(t)}},window.DOMTokenList=t,n(Element.prototype,"classList",function(){return new t(this)})}}();

    var myNav = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
    var ieVer = (myNav.indexOf('msie') != -1) ? parseInt(myNav.split('msie')[1]) : false;
    var App = window.App || {};
    App.is_logged = true;
    App.imgBase = "i0";
    function labInit(){

        loadCSS("/css/libs_1490280474.css");
        var ml = loadCSS("/css/main_1610570146.css");
        /*
        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            document.getElementById("spinner").className += ' hidden';
            rc('main', 'ws');
        });
        */

        onloadCSS( ml, function() {
            var elems = document.getElementsByTagName('*'), i;
            for (i in elems) {
                if((' ' + elems[i].className + ' ').indexOf(' ws ')> -1) {
                    elems[i].className = elems[i].className.replace('ws', '');
                }
            }
        });

            $LAB
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer <= 8){
            return '/js/html5shiv.js';
        }
    })
    .script('/js/skel.min.js').wait(function(){
    skel.breakpoints({
      xxlarge: '(max-width: 5000px)',
      xlarge: '(max-width: 1600px)',
      large: '(max-width: 1280px)',
      medium: '(max-width: 1024px)',
      small: '(max-width: 736px)',
      xsmall: '(max-width: 480px)'
    });
    rc('top-logo', 'ws');
    rc('header', 'ws');
    rc('submenu', 'ws');
    })
    .script(function(){
        if(ieVer !== false && ieVer < 9){
            return "/js/jquery-1.11.3.min.js";
        }else{
            return "/js/jquery-2.1.4.min.js";
        }
    }).wait()
    .script("/js/libs_1484923518.js").script("/polyglot.i18n.js").script("/js/main_1585304528.js").wait(function(){App.mainInit()}).script("/js/product_1518530675.js").script("/js/rating_1489182555.js").script("https:\/\/www.google.com/books/jsapi.js").wait().script('https://books.google.com/books?jscmd=viewapi&callback=App.setGPreview&bibkeys='+9781491952023)}</script>
